title: Collaborative Meaning-Making Mathematics Learning Design Based on Immersive VR

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations of Mathematical Modeling and Data Interpretation, Basic Usage of VR Devices
context.additional_context: Application of mathematical concepts and collaborative problem-solving activities in smartphone-based VR environments

learning_goals: Learners can transform real-world problems presented in VR environments into mathematical models.
Learners can explain mathematical problem-solving processes through reflective dialogues with peers.
Learners can analyze patterns observed in VR simulations using statistical and geometric principles.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
